attributes.action: Cause and Permit a Full and Unfettled Coroners Inquest on Dr. DAVID KELLY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dr. DAVID KELLY was an eminent and respected scientist who sadly died in suspicious circumstances. His mode of death or reasons for so dying have never been truly explained. The People now request an unfettered Full and Open Coroners Inquest to decide these factors, for the public good. to restore Faith in the British Government and our Democracy.
